entities.name: stone
entities.description: The Philosopher's Stone is mentioned as an object that can grant immortality. It must be drunk regularly to maintain immortality.

entities.name: horcruxes
entities.description: Horcruxes are mentioned as a concept that Lord Voldemort would prefer over the Philosopher's Stone for achieving immortality.

entities.name: elixir of life
entities.description: The Elixir of Life is an object that extends life but must be drunk regularly to maintain immortality.

entities.name: lord voldemort
entities.description: Lord Voldemort is a person who seeks immortality and has considered using the Philosopher's Stone or Elixir of Life.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a person who explains why Lord Voldemort would prefer Horcruxes over the Philosopher's Stone.

relationships.description: Lord Voldemort prefers Horcruxes to the Philosopher's Stone for achieving immortality.
Dumbledore explains why Lord Voldemort would prefer Horcruxes over the Philosopher's Stone.
